name: market for finishing, textile, woven cotton | finishing, textile, woven cotton | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21261/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'finishing, textile, woven cotton', in the Global geography.;This market is not considering transportation since the service is produced and consumed in physically the same location.;This is delivering the service of 'finishing, textile, woven cotton' and includes all necessary materials, energy, water, wastewater (produced within the process) and infrastructure in order to process 1 kg of cotton textile that is produced through weaving. Finishing is a process applied after dying and aims at improving the appearance and texture of the textile. A user should use this service alongside 1 kg of textile, woven cotton.

Activity starts with the production of the service of finishing, textile, woven cotton.

Activity ends with the provision of the service of finishing, textile, woven cotton.
